hero.title: Reinvent your product photography process with PackshotCreator

intro.heading: The range of photo studios that combines speed and inspiration
intro.text1: With over 20 years of expertise, PackshotCreator has redefined visual content creation. Our partnerships with Orbitvu and ShotFlow have enriched our range to meet the highest demands.
intro.text2: A complete range of photo studios to adapt to every need. Software-driven automation provides speed and fluidity throughout the visual creation process.

orbitvu.heading: Automated solutions for product photography
orbitvu.description: Orbitvu's advanced technologies enable the production of ready-to-publish visuals online in just 3 seconds, significantly reducing time-to-market.

shotflow.heading: Mastery of the workflow management
shotflow.description: ShotFlow is the reference tool that allows you to master all stages of visual content creation, giving each department of the company the means to act or transform the production process.

alphashot.heading: Automation, AI: test Alphashot Pro G2
alphashot.description: The Alphashot Pro G2 simplifies your shoots with AI and automation. Capture images, videos and 360° animations in seconds, with optimized lighting and no technical skills required.

blog.heading: News and Tutorials
blog.description: Don't miss the latest news in automated product photography. Our blog is the essential reference for industry trends and technological advances.

formateur.bio1: 20 years of experience in product photography for the biggest luxury brands (Cartier, Rolex, Van Cleef & Arpels).

calendrier.heading: Calendar & Registration

q1.question: How does OPCO funding work?
q1.answer: Your company (or yourself if self-employed) contacts its OPCO to request coverage. PackshotCreator provides the quote and detailed program. The OPCO can fund up to 100% of the training cost.

q2.question: What is the difference between Blended and In-Person?
q2.answer: Blended: 50% e-learning (videos at your own pace) + 50% in-person/video (intensive practice). Reduced price by 24-27%. In-Person: 100% in-class with the trainer. More interactions, 1:1 coaching, lunches included.

q3.question: Do I need to already have an Orbitvu studio to take Packshot training?
q3.answer: No, the training takes place in our Lyon showroom equipped with all studios (Alphashot, Station M, etc.). You can then decide to acquire your own equipment.

q4.question: Do AI training programs require a BlendAI subscription?
q4.answer: BlendAI access is included during training and for 30 days after. Then, you can subscribe to a plan (from €75/month) if you wish to continue.
